description:
Logs  as:

HTTPInternalServerError (HTTP 500)
+ RAMDISK_ID=
+ glance --os-auth-token -CjhdyUiOLFNj-r+T-d6Il6bz716pHXs-9vO-esdJvRcSN9z+eV0SMliUt1DcVWuJ5BHOyCMxbZrEuPksZG6EhU6lxgDsPy5nAwbhpfjU7Jufhctk3xz9TwPtziZpvlcnTEenEMohQD33thqnRc4+mqu-kcTuNm4nOpqdeg+vL+DiaO42hcKPE1U9s8vaKL-6CUzdHTOmY03Vv7OtTnQVeC7EWuQpqM4r3CQS++LhwTgKPcJhUFm5fvpUAGCSxtudu1JyamGVvBF-nFwvQV6GD1g95Zxj9GhiNxt9Ksh4dkkNCAUeHRr5rwDEMhiNU8Y08AGhwevVxo14= --os-image-url http://192.168.1.106:9292 image-create --name cirros-0.3.1-x86_64-uec --is-public True --container-format ami --disk-format ami
HTTPInternalServerError (HTTP 500)
++ failed
++ local r=1
+++ jobs -p
++ kill
++ set +o xtrace

and then it ended .
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i run the restart_stack.sh
logs show:
Waiting for nova-api to start...
nova-api did not start

i try to resolve the problem by 
reboot my ubuntu
and modify the /etc/glance/glance-api.conf  l264  "rabbit_durable_queues = False" replaced with "rabbit_durable_queues = True"

there're no effection.
title: when i  run ./stack.sh latest,start openstack failed by 'glance-api not started '

comments.content:
Logs  as:

HTTPInternalServerError (HTTP 500)
+ RAMDISK_ID=
+ glance --os-auth-token -CjhdyUiOLFNj-r+T-d6Il6bz716pHXs-9vO-esdJvRcSN9z+eV0SMliUt1DcVWuJ5BHOyCMxbZrEuPksZG6EhU6lxgDsPy5nAwbhpfjU7Jufhctk3xz9TwPtziZpvlcnTEenEMohQD33thqnRc4+mqu-kcTuNm4nOpqdeg+vL+DiaO42hcKPE1U9s8vaKL-6CUzdHTOmY03Vv7OtTnQVeC7EWuQpqM4r3CQS++LhwTgKPcJhUFm5fvpUAGCSxtudu1JyamGVvBF-nFwvQV6GD1g95Zxj9GhiNxt9Ksh4dkkNCAUeHRr5rwDEMhiNU8Y08AGhwevVxo14= --os-image-url http://192.168.1.106:9292 image-create --name cirros-0.3.1-x86_64-uec --is-public True --container-format ami --disk-format ami
HTTPInternalServerError (HTTP 500)
++ failed
++ local r=1
+++ jobs -p
++ kill
++ set +o xtrace

and then it ended .
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i run the restart_stack.sh
logs show:
Waiting for nova-api to start...
nova-api did not start

i try to resolve the problem by 
reboot my ubuntu
and modify the /etc/glance/glance-api.conf  l264  "rabbit_durable_queues = False" replaced with "rabbit_durable_queues = True"

there're no effection.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wangxh-smart

comments.content: this case  didn't  occurred  at the first time.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wangxh-smart

comments.content: What is the nova bug here?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
I resolved this problem by 
copy /etc/glance/glance.conf  to  recover  /opt/stack/etc/glance.conf
because the path of /opt/stack/glance/glance.conf  with  original setting.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~wangxh-smart

comments.content: Sounds like it wasn't a nova issue in the end
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
thanks for your help.
and i've submit an answer .it's address is as below:
https://answers.launchpad.net/nova/+question/243622

hope your help sincerely.

Sounds like it wasn't a nova issue in the end

Title:
  when i  run ./stack.sh latest,start openstack failed by "glance-api
  not started "

Status in OpenStack Compute (Nova):
  Invalid

Bug description:
  Logs  as:

  HTTPInternalServerError (HTTP 500)
  + RAMDISK_ID=
  + glance --os-auth-token -CjhdyUiOLFNj-r+T-d6Il6bz716pHXs-9vO-esdJvRcSN9z+eV0SMliUt1DcVWuJ5BHOyCMxbZrEuPksZG6EhU6lxgDsPy5nAwbhpfjU7Jufhctk3xz9TwPtziZpvlcnTEenEMohQD33thqnRc4+mqu-kcTuNm4nOpqdeg+vL+DiaO42hcKPE1U9s8vaKL-6CUzdHTOmY03Vv7OtTnQVeC7EWuQpqM4r3CQS++LhwTgKPcJhUFm5fvpUAGCSxtudu1JyamGVvBF-nFwvQV6GD1g95Zxj9GhiNxt9Ksh4dkkNCAUeHRr5rwDEMhiNU8Y08AGhwevVxo14= --os-image-url http://192.168.1.106:9292 image-create --name cirros-0.3.1-x86_64-uec --is-public True --container-format ami --disk-format ami
  HTTPInternalServerError (HTTP 500)
  ++ failed
  ++ local r=1
  +++ jobs -p
  ++ kill
  ++ set +o xtrace

  and then it ended .
  ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  i run the restart_stack.sh
  logs show:
  Waiting for nova-api to start...
  nova-api did not start

  i try to resolve the problem by 
  reboot my ubuntu
  and modify the /etc/glance/glance-api.conf  l264  "rabbit_durable_queues = False" replaced with "rabbit_durable_queues = True"

  there're no effection.
